amendment.description: Amendment sought to transfer $15 million from the U.S. Geological Survey to the National Park Service land acquisition fund.
amendment.purpose: An amendment printed in the Congressional Record of July 12 as amendment No. 58, that increases the land acquisition and water conservation fund account by $15 million, and reduces by the same amount the United States Geological Survey--Surveys, Investigations, and Research Account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Mica amendment (A015) Failed by voice vote.
